description.value:
Master Crafted Relic Astartes Jump Pack of the Raptors Chapter. User can never suffer worse than a -20 to their Pilot (Personal) Tests from terrain or space contstraints in any area large enough to fit them when using this jump pack. Whilst in a jungle or forest, grants +10 to Pilot (Personal) Tests to use this. Also grants regular Astartes Jump Pack effects.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 35 R
